column1: '''Halfred Gamgee''' was a Hobbit of [[the Shire]].
Halfred was the youngest son of [[Hobson
column3: Gamgee}}</ref> and had one son, [[Halfast Gamgee
column4: Halfast]], who worked for the local [[Boffin Family

column1: The name comes from [[Old English]] ''healfrēad'' "half-red, reddish" or from ''healfrǣd'' "half counsel".<ref>[[Jim Allan]] (ed.), ''[[An Introduction to Elvish]]'', Giving of names</ref>
